greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{k=1..n} n^(k/gcd(n, k)).
formula: a(n) = Sum_{d|n} Sum_{k=1..d, gcd(k, d) = 1} n^k.
program: (MAGMA) [&+[n^(k div Gcd(n,k)):k in [1..n]]:n in [1..21]]; // _Marius A. Burtea_, Feb 18 2020
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Feb 18 2020
